body_html:
I think we should mark all the failing cc tests as "no_windows", just like the python tests. Then we won't have the command line length limit.

We're not running cc tests on TF CI yet, so it's not my first priority currently, feel free to send a PR for this.

body:
I think we should mark all the failing cc tests as "no_windows", just like the python tests. Then we won't have the command line length limit.

We're not running cc tests on TF CI yet, so it's not my first priority currently, feel free to send a PR for this.
